fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone during the day or night.
- Send someone back in time to create a new timeline at any time, processes immediately.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use both abilities in one phase. You, however, can only use your second ability once per phase across *all* timelines.
- When sending someone back in time, you select a phase to base a new timeline off of. You remove that player from the current timeline, then move them into the other one. They are now 2 players in that timeline.
- Timelines act as separate games, but your ability will see them all simply as different timelines.
- Until you are dead in every timeline, a game that would normally in one timeline will not. After that, timelines can end separately. Additionally, your second ability has a one phase cooldown for each timeline you are dead in.
- You can move one player to another timeline to create another timeline.
